messages.agent_message: I can also create a new account for you. Would you like to do that today?
Ok! No accounts will be created.
Would you like to e-transfer any money to your contacts?
Ok! How much would you like to send and to who?
messages.user_message: I want to transfer 7 to Sandra.

messages.agent_message: Which account would you like to select for this task?
Ok! I just e-transferred 7 to Sandra from chequing.
Would you like to pay off your outstanding bills today?
Which bill would you like to pay off?
Which account would you like to select for this task?
Ok, I'm paying your mortgage bill from your chequing account.
Would you like to request money from a contact?
How much money would you like to request and from who?
messages.user_message: I need to request that Mark pays me 2.

messages.agent_message: 2 were requested from Mark. I'll notify you when the payment is received.
Are you looking to perform any transfers today?
Completed all bank actions for today. Thank you!
